page.title: 08CRAB & WEST WOOD,SPARSHOLT.
page.content: The west side of Crab Wood is called West Wood and is managed by the Forestry Commission.This area is not a nature reserve and people are encouraged to this part.There is a car park, barbeque area and lots of bridle paths and foot paths. When the blue bells and primroses are out in flower in Crab Wood it is very beautiful and when the sun is shining it is even more beautiful. Crab Wood is a lovely place for tourists to visit and as it is not very far from Winchester people can easily get there.
